column5: Had written a story and posted here awhile back, about a solo trip to Northern Ontario that followed with some guiding for a fly fishing T.V. show. The fishing ended up so good that the program actually aired two episodes instead of one this past winter. These two links were the end result of our experience. So, if you're into beautiful speckled trout or giant pike, maybe you'll wanna watch. At least it's commercial free... SPECKLED TROUT EPISODE.http://bunksoutdoorangle.com/the-new...igon-brookies/ PIKE EPISODE.http://bunksoutdoorangle.com/the-new...igon-pike-ep1/ Spring is nearly upon us! Good luck out there.
